Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory685.jpg'}
{3: 'The extension of the red carpet stops at a shut door.'}
{3: 'This museum is the outermost one among all, Iris Warbler has reached here without a problem.'}
{3: 'From the decorations, sculptures, and words on the outside, it no doubt screams "welcome" to all passersby.'}
{3: 'But paired with deafening silence, it makes the whole scene a bit eerie.'}
{3: 'Looks like it is not just somewhere one passes to get to the windmills.'}
{3: 'It is worth investigating.'}
{3: 'And so the three Constructs look over at Sica.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sica', 3: "Let's investigate it then.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Not wasting a second, Ayla makes her way over to the control panel and wakes up the system.'}
{3: 'It was not as hard as she imagined, the door to the museum opened after a few clicks of a button.'}
{3: 'Now for the final questionâ€”'}
{3: 'Who should be the vanguard in this limited space?'}
{1: '1', 3: "Looking at Sica who is deep in thought, Trojan steps forward. Even though she keeps insisting that she isn't at her prime anymore, she's still a Tank..."}
{3: 'Ayla shouts passionately as she enters the museum.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lena and Trojan glance at each other, until the latter shrugs.'}
{3: 'Since she has a new frame, then let her lead.'}
{3: 'It is a good chance to observe first hand what Kaleido can do.'}
